name: Gemini (Gameheads)
description:
After reading a confidential letter, Ron finds out his company is going under and is forced to utilize passive and aggressive actions in order to avoid guards, collect company information, and ultimately save the his own skin … or the company he works for. 

Gemini is a top down, corporate thriller full of excitement and tension. Sneak past enemies, persuade, interact and distract your co-workers as you make your way through Gemini Cloud Co. on your journey towards exposing its corrupt CEO.
